snippet: Apple's iMessage, the free, Internet-based text-messaging service, isn't the only thing AT&T's chief executive should lose sleep over. Facebook is eating into text-messaging revenues for carriers, too, according to a report.
abstract: Apple's iMessage, the free, Internet-based text-messaging service, isn't the only thing AT&T's chief executive should lose sleep over. Facebook is eating into text-messaging revenues for carriers, too, according to a report.

headline.main: Facebook Is Killing Text Messaging, Report Says
